name: Crow Chirp
descriptionShort: This project is a Twitter Clone. It contains key features such as authentication, creating, liking and retweeting posts, commenting on posts and deleting posts. You can also change your profile picture, search for specific posts or profiles.
descriptionLong: This project is a Twitter Clone. It contains key features such as authentication, creating, liking and retweeting posts, commenting and deleting posts. You can also change your profile picture, search for specific posts or profiles.
The frontend is built using Javascript, CSS (Bootstrap) and HTML. The backend is built using Node.js with Express and Express Handlebars. MongoDB was used for the database.
Crow Chirp thought me a lot about session management, authentication, authorization, database management and much more. It was a great project to work on and I learned a lot from it.

name: Handwriting Digit Recognition
descriptionShort: This is a simple app that uses a self-made deep learning model to recognize handwritten digits. The model was trained on the MNIST dataset. The app is built using HTML, CSS and JS on the client and Python with FastApi on the server.
descriptionLong: This is a simple app that uses a self-made deep learning model to recognize handwritten digits. The model was trained on the MNIST dataset which contains over 70.000 images in total.

The model creation, training and testing is done on separate github projects. The app is built using HTML, CSS and JS on the client and Python with FastApi on the server. The client can draw an digit and the server will return the prediction of the model.

This project thought me about how I can use my model in a real world application. The focus of this project wasn't the webpage but the model and how I can use it to receive data from the client (handwritten digit) and send it to the server and send a prediction back to the client.

name: VideoStreamTube
descriptionShort: Using an API from RapidAPI I was able to create a video streaming website. This website allows you to search for videos and watch them. It also has a dark mode feature.
descriptionLong: Using an API from RapidAPI I was able to create a video streaming website. This website allows you to search for YouTube videos and watch them. It also has a dark mode feature.
This project thought me about React and the uses of dynamic routes. It also thought me about how to use an API with best practices in React.

name: Text Summary App
descriptionShort: This web application is a basic text summary implementation using transformers and NLP to summarize your text in one sentence. It uses a pre-trained model from HuggingFace.
descriptionLong: This web application is a basic text summary implementation using transformers and NLP to summarize your text in one sentence. It uses a pre-trained model from HuggingFace.
The frontend is built using Javascript, CSS and HTML. The backend is built using RapidAPI.
Even though this text summary app uses a pre-trained model, it thought me a lot about how to use NLP and transformers.

name: Github/Gitlab Issue Board
descriptionShort: This is a simple issue board that allows you to create, edit, delete and view issues. You can move the issue around based on the status of the issue.
descriptionLong: This is a simple issue board that allows you to create, edit, delete and view issues. You can move the issue around based on the status of the issue.
The frontend is built using React and Typescript. The backend is built using FastApi and Python. The database is just a simple json file where the issues are stored.
This project thought me about the essentials of a project. I don't need user authentication, authorization, db ... to have a working issue board (POC). I would want to add those things later.
I also learned how to drag and drop elements with the built in HTML5 drag and drop API and I used the dialog tag in html.

name: Car Rental
descriptionShort: This website is a prototype for a non-existant car rental company. It has a 'home', 'customer stories', 'vehicle models', 'about us', 'team', and a 'contact us' page.
descriptionLong: This website is a prototype for a non-existant car rental company. It has a 'home', 'customer stories', 'vehicle models', 'about us', 'team', and 'contact us' page.
This project was made by using React and React Router Dom to redirect users to different pages.

name: Coming Soon: Data Science Project
descriptionShort: This project will use real world data to create a data science project. It will be a project containing data analysis, data visualization and machine learning or deep learning. The visualization will be done using PowerBI.
descriptionLong: This project will use real world data to create a data science project. It will be a project containing data analysis, data visualization and machine learning or deep learning. The visualization will be done using PowerBI.
This project will be done in the future.
